about_the_game:
After a rift was created by the corruption of the power gauntlets forged by Omega, an army called the void emerges with one goal of spreading its void across the multiverse. You (The player) was a Lieutenant of the 20th Defense Battalion of the Old Empire. The Overseer Task Force assigned you in exchange for a shortened prison sentence to prepare defensives for an invasion from the void.

Use Cash to purchase towers around the map to defend your generators from the void. Every wave gets harder so make sure you are keeping up with upgrading the towers with cash. Special enemies spawn as the waves progress giving you better rewards or a harder time. You can choose to defend from the void or begin the offensive into the void by selecting the map that you would like to play.  Prepare for the onslaught of the void and send them back.

Features:

10 Tower upgrades

4 Special Enemies

2 Maps with different tower placements and enemy pathing

80 Waves to beat

This is my first game I will publish, I am a beginner to coding and have taken a course with Circuit Stream to introduce myself into the world of Game Development. I will look at all feed back to further improve my abilities and make great experiences for all players.

name: Void Vanguard

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2,00 Ghz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The void will never stop, it's up to you to contain it in a tower defense game.
